name: OmnomnONE
description:
OmnomnONE!

You are a white blood cell absorbing viruses and bacteria in the blood stream.

Absorb your enemies by touching them so all become ONE.

While enemies are being absorbed, you can use them to deflect projectiles!

Controls:

Up / Down / Left / Right to move.

Z / X to rotate.

Absorb all enemies to fill the size bar and advance to the next stage!

The executable version usually runs better than in browser, so if the online version has unstable framerate, please download the version below!

Made for #gmtkjam in less than 24h!
